entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Wiarton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:25 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -4.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 5:00 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -4.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -7.3°C
Wind: NNE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. High minus 8.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 10 with temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 10 with temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
